alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued July 18 at 11:20AM HST until July 19 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6PM HST THIS EVENING FOR MAUI COUNTY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY FOR MAUI COUNTY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY FOR OAHU AND KAUAI... .Winds will steadily strengthen today through tonight as Tropical Storm Calvin passes near the Big Island and south of the smaller islands tonight. Damaging winds will be possible especially over Maui County. The strongest winds will likely occur in areas over and downwind of terrain. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, east winds 35 to 60 mph with localized gusts over 75 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, east winds 30 to 40 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 PM HST Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
